description: Try our easy to follow Herbed Salmon Fillets with Mango & Chilli Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Valentine's Day,Sesame free,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Herbed Salmon Fillets with Mango & Chilli Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk parsley & garlic with olive oil. Pour over salmon & refrigerate for 10 minutes.
Finely dice the flesh of mangoes and place in a medium bowl. Add cucumber, chilli and lime juice. Mix well and place in fridge.
Place salmon fillets on a medium heat BBQ and cook for 4 minutes on one side, turn over and baste with reserved marinade and cook for 3 minutes.
Serve salmon with mango & chilli salsa.
